page.title: 12Government Littlebourne area
page.content: Each village has its own Parish Council. The Hamlet of Bramling is attached to Ickham , Wingham Well to Wingham. The Parish Clerk is responsible for the organisation + accounts of the council. L'bourne has 9 members and meets every 3rd Thursday .Ickham has 7 members + meets every 2 months. W'breux has 7 members + meets every 3rd Tuesday. Each Parish council is responsible for footpaths (marking and obstructions). Recreation Ground + Play equipment, Village Hall, commenting on planning, Best Kept village Competition, Charities e.g. Sloyden + Durrant. At the annual Parish meeting the Parish Council gives an account of its work through the year + parishioners put questions and suggestions. Littlebourne PC is also responsible for lighting + has about 40 allotment plots.
